<JD_START>
Job Title: 1st Shift Receiving - Production Lead

Location: Princeton, KY

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Employee Type:

Full time

Location:

KY Princeton

Job Type:

Production Operations

Job Posting Title:

1st Shift Receiving - Production Lead

About Us:

TreeHouse Foods (NYSE: THS) is a leading manufacturer of private label packaged foods and beverages, operating a network of production facilities across the United States and Canada. At TreeHouse Foods, our commitment to excellence extends beyond our products and revolves around our people. We are investing in talent and creating a performance-based culture where employees can do their best work, directly impacting our mission to make high quality, affordable food for our customers, communities and families. We hope you will consider joining the team and being part of our future.

What You Gain:

Competitive compensation and benefits programEnrollment in our wellness and employee assistance programsPaid holidays, vacation, and other competitive paid time off opportunitiesAn inclusive working environment where you can build meaningful work relationships with a diverse group of people Leaders who are invested in supporting your career growthOpportunities to be recognized for outstanding contributions to your team through our employee recognition programs

Job Description:

[Receiving Production Lead – Princeton]

About Us:

TreeHouse Foods (NYSE: THS) is a leading manufacturer of private label packaged foods and beverages, operating a network of production facilities across the United States and Canada. At TreeHouse Foods, our commitment to excellence extends beyond our products and revolves around our people. We are investing in talent and creating a performance-based culture where employees can do their best work, directly impacting our mission to make high quality, affordable food for our customers, communities and families. We hope you will consider joining the team and being part of our future.

What You Gain:

Competitive compensation and benefits programEnrollment in our wellness and employee assistance programsPaid holidays, vacation, and other competitive paid time off opportunitiesAn inclusive working environment where you can build meaningful work relationships with a diverse group of people Leaders who are invested in supporting your career growthOpportunities to be recognized for outstanding contributions to your team through our employee recognition programs

About the Role:

The Receiving Production Lead role at the Princeton location is responsible for coordinating personnel regarding ingredient inventory activities that move material to and from the Mixing, Cutting, and Production Areas, both physically and electronically. The position is responsible for ensuring that all Production Supply Area locations are appropriately supplied material components necessary to satisfy process order requirements. The position is also responsible for completing all required SAP receipt transactions, either by handheld device or PC, in relation to the issuance of goods and accounting of ingredient inventories. You’ll add value to this role by performing various functions including, but not limited to:

Receiving inbound materials and ingredients while managing inventory rotation and sanitation in warehouse.Learning and maintaining all proper documentation and system reporting.Perform all inspections and checks while ensuring department’s adherence to GMPs.Being responsible for recognizing and reporting people safety, food safety, and/or quality issues.

Important Details: This is a full-time permanent role, which has rotating days off. Shift hours typically follow a minimum of 8 hours with a maximum of 12 hours.

1st Shift: 6:30am – 2:30pm

2nd Shift: 2:30pm – 10:30pm

3rd Shift: 10:30pm – 6:30am

About You:

You’ll fit right in:

Demonstrated experience following instructions/process documents and providing effective communication, both verbal and written.Experience in a manufacturing environment – food manufacturing a plus.Physical ability to lift 50 pounds, complete changeovers, lift, twist, bend, and carry.Fork-truck experience - preferred.

The ability to work overtime and weekends.

Your TreeHouse Foods Career is Just a Click Away!

Click on the “Apply” button or go directly to www.treehousefoods.com/careers to let us know you’re ready to join our team!

TreeHouse Use Only: #IND1

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
<JD_END>
